Reviews.Title: “Don't go there!”
Reviews.Author: LeTourer
Reviews.Content: family couple booked prepaid night stay months arrived travelling australia six people meant bed amsterdam nightmare discover dump fussy stinks cigarette rude owner poky bugs pillows toilet leaked shown meal thinking look drinks didnt piled hired van found friendly staff clean near airport steer

Reviews.Title: “Awful staff, disgusting room. Ruined out trip to Amsterdam.”
Reviews.Author: christine c
Reviews.Content: experience hotel ruined trip amsterdam im picky didnt expect 4 star hotel expect clean wouldnt worst enemy spend night booked hotel february thinking staying basic clean hotel double bed bathroom instead arrival sent twin communal bathroom ceiling 3 foot stretch mold leaked told reception refunds changes speak manager weekend found hard receipt proof stay secured check staff absolutely complaints rude unfriendly staff complaints stuck moldy completely unacceptable bathroom unclean bathroom double bed communal bathroom couldnt walk people kept trying walk sleep window staying didnâ€™t breathe mold wasnt warm rained tempted extra cost change hotels woman desk refused hand money prior seeing disgraceful couldnt change accommodation hotels gone money unable forced stay hotel completely ruined trip cant describe horrible hotel staff ignorant people

Reviews.Title: “This is the worst hotel ever”
Reviews.Author: Sen2012
Reviews.Content: booked hotel online bookingcom 11th january 2012 mistake instead booking 19 booked 12th 2012 7 minutes realized mistake bookingcom tricky called bookingcom explained matter hotel hour reply called shock life front office manager named nelly rude believe ears hotel policy cancel dont cancel change check date called tried talk supervisor called luis tried talk called hotel nelly phone told literally wrong booking money dont care dont money hang phone truly experience hotels life happened amsterdam mugged guys contact address authority charge hotels grateful please send email thank reading regards

Reviews.Title: “Simple basic rooms without fuss at a good location (with a bicycle!)”
Reviews.Author: emelyn_alex
Reviews.Content: complaints hotel shared bathroom clean comfortable tv functioning sink window fresh air narrow staircase leading bigger bags careful finding cheap hotel amsterdam easy minute trip grateful managed hotel hotel city centre se easily overcome renting bicycle attractions easily accessible suggest explore amsterdam bicycle flea market close reasonably cheap priced items waterlooplein party animals intend stay hotel dinner hotel shops morning lovely bakery nearby selling sandwiches coffee shop real coffee coffee overall pleasant experience definitely consider

Reviews.Title: “Nice & Clean!”
Reviews.Author: Travellers_secrets
Reviews.Content: stayed double 1 double bed 2 single beds comfy spacious cleaned daily sink shared bathroom floor top floor 5 floors lots stairs walk top bathroom walk shower kept clean downside smoking shouldnt night receptionist smoke careful elsewhere lady receptionist nice lots maps info trams buses excursions etc city beautiful hotel 15 mins walk centre 5 mins walk nice market nice watch bikes

Reviews.Title: “One of the Worst”
Reviews.Author: Stodds73
Reviews.Content: reason stayed price quickly regretted amsterdam expensive opt 90 euro night hotel stay 50 euros night riding bikes night didnt hotel reception nice compared bathroom smelt funny stains ceiling sheets towels clean bathroom tiny cleanest reception 630 catch train morning waited check slip key door somewhat location close via bike overall stay pay

Reviews.Title: “great budget hotel”
Reviews.Author: jamdamy1
Reviews.Content: stayed girlfriend 4 days bad reviews cautious dont clean tidy little amazing value money deal 21 euros night fantastic location 10 mins town centre helpful friendly staff sink bed cupboard etc feel comfortable sleep budget hotels doesnt bad little noisy loud neighbouring guests walls little thin shared bathroom floor kept clean tidy recommended singles couples 4

Reviews.Title: “Stay as far away as possible from this establishment.”
Reviews.Author: AnySadegs
Reviews.Content: looked bathhouse dark kinda damp strong smell chlorine internet connection homepage promised told available time clue coming immediatly paid cancellation fee hotel cant mind stay wasnt cheap johan

Reviews.Title: “TERRIBLE”

Reviews.Content: hotel horrendous price expensive hotel accommodations bad hostel warning pay cash front secondly cat roaming hotel mentioned website disgusting obviously kept floor board leading bathroom actually connected floor sliding door bathroom hanging ceiling thread hairs bedding cleaning service days left towel time people front desk service unwelcoming traveling europe months sincerely worst hotel worst price stayed recommend hotel else
